wikipedia_page.main: Bryan Thomas Grenfell  (born 1954) is a British population biologist and the Kathryn Briger and Sarah Fenton Professor of Ecology and Evolutionary Biology and Public Affairs at the School of Public and International Affairs at Princeton University.

response: * Wellcome Trust, Member of the Board of Governors (2014–2021)Professor Bryan Grenfell and Professor Tobias Bonhoeffer join the Wellcome Trust Board of Governors Wellcome Trust, press release of July 7, 2014.
